name: Ottomania Part II: Wild Juice Chase
name_original: Ottomania Part II: Wild Juice Chase
description:
HOTS zombies have descended on the Rift, and only Turk, BamBam, Mewnfare, and PhotoChess can put an end to their mayhem! 

This tactical RPG adventure is a one-man labor of love featuring hand-made sprites, an engaging story paying loving homage to League of Legends and tactical RPGs. Part 2 of a 4-part series that spans multiple worlds and introduces new and familiar faces, your generous donation helps buy me the time to complete this epic quest!

This game can be played with keyboard+mouse, gamepad, or a touch interface. It is highly recommended that you save early and often. There are occasional instances where an enemy will get caught in an infinite pathing loop that softlocks the game during battle. This issue will hopefully be resolved in an upcoming update, but for now, it occurs rarely enough that I felt comfortable releasing the game.

I hope you enjoy Ottomania Part II: Wild Juice Chase!

If you are interested in supporting this and other projects, consider becoming a Patron for ongoing updates, early access to playtest builds, and more:
